f51d9015-5c83-4450-84c0-28d4590c12d7.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their leadership skills through successfully completing a higher education talent development course delivered by Credo, LLC. The earner identified their leadership style, increased their understanding of key data measures to guide strategies and actions, successfully collaborated with a diverse group of leadership styles to solve a challenge frequently faced by leaders in higher education, and learned more about courageous conversations.
f51d9015-5c83-4450-84c0-28d4590c12d7.name: Higher Ed Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners analyzed and applied personal leadership strengths using REACH data in the context of higher education administration by participating in small group discussions to practice collaborating with different leadership styles.
Badge earners showcased their understanding of higher education data by collaborating with peer leaders across campuses and solving a short-term problem related to student retention.
Badge earners completed the REACH survey. They reflected on personal styles and demonstrated understanding by interacting with different leadership styles in the context of higher education.
